name: Off-Road Centipede Truck Driving Simulator 3D Game
name_original: Off-Road Centipede Truck Driving Simulator 3D Game
description:
First ever Centipede Truck Simulator game for extreme offroad adventures. Grab steering of 8 wheeler russian centipede truck and go way way offroading. Play Offroad Centipede Truck 3D simulator game and become a real truck driver on bumpy hill roads. This monster vehicle ATV knows no boundaries; drive thru marshes, swamps and running water like flying car.

This ATV truck has top speed of 50 mph and can climb steep 45 degree on big rocks and hurdles. Drive through thick mud on sloppy terrain and steep hilly roads. This amphibious vehicle has powerful revved up engine with 160 horsepower. Awesome truck can traverse anything with great suspension. Do not stuck in the mud and push race throttle to maximum. Latest invention in euro truck lets you enjoy offroad racing experience with heavy machinery like mountain jeep. Relish master driving on world’s most difficult terrains under extreme conditions. Become a real offroad driver and steer gigantic vehicle with its 8 tires in huge open world off-terrain environment. Enjoy interactive gameplay with offroad car that can run underwater or on mountain top bumpy tracks.

Key Features:
Extremely challenging driving and hill climb missions on mountains
Multiple centipede trucks to choose with strong horse power engine
Realistic offroad tracks on hill top outskirts far from city area
Power pack steering with hydraulic pressure brakes
Real physics engine with firm tyre grip and wheel suspension
Flawless driver controls on off-road bumpy tracks
Interactive gameplay and immersive 3D graphics for real driving feels


Kindly give us your feedback in the reviews section so that we may improve our game in future updates.
